Text: Thanks alot. Can't wait to hear this. Been waiting for a solo album from Greg for a long time!
great allman stuff for a change for these times. thanks man.

It's unfortunate that Greg wont be remembered for his soulful contributions to american music until he passes. He's influenced so many...

thanks for the up, this is awesome.
Loving it...glad he's back and T-Bone does it again. Thanks!
I've downloaded many, many albums uploaded by you. Thanks a lot :)
